subject: Marketing
title: The Bandwagon Effect
description: Learn The Bandwagon Effect in one minute.

hook.text: A nightclub keeps a long line outside even when it's half empty inside.

buildup.text: The line signals popularity. Popularity signals quality. People join.

discovery.text: The bandwagon effect: we adopt behaviors simply because others already have.

twist.text: It accelerates both ways. Popularity breeds more. Decline breeds more decline.

climax.text: Trending labels, download counters, and waitlists all manufacture the bandwagon.

punchline.text: Nobody wants to be first. Everyone wants to be next.

quiz.question: What drives the bandwagon effect?
options: People adopt behaviors because others already have
Exclusive access makes products more desirable
